body_html: The problem is that I want to compute the loss for each instance, and sort the losses. The OHEM will only keep the high loss instances for backpropagation. What you refer to is adding weights to loss vector. It is not obvious to me how to make this transition . I can only add zero weights to those losses I do not need after it computes all losses.
